mailcontent: This is your unclaimed Rewards in Spirit Gear Realm, please claim them.
desc:
After the fall of the spirits, Spirit Gear were scattered in a mysterious area - Spirit Gear Realm
Gather warriors to search for the legendary Spirit Gear!
The more challenges you pass within the time limit, the greater the reward!
|C:0xf5e65a&T:Tips: After joining the Dungeon, call your friends to challenge together for more rewards! |
yaoqingdesc:
The Spirit Gear Challenge is coming, rally your friends and get ready!
 Send an invitation to the whole server to get more rewards
